name: Aloha Mahalo Hawaiian Handmade Green/Gold Ribbon Lei
description:
Aloha Mahalo Hawaiian Handmade Celebration Ribbon Lei

A lei is something that is given to another with the intent to decorate that person for an emotional reason—usually as a sign of affection. Common reasons include greeting, farewell, love, friendship, appreciation, congratulation, recognition, or to otherwise draw attention to the recipient. The most popular occasion at which leis can be found are graduations.

Colors: Green and Gold
Materials: 175 yards of satin ribbon
Hours Invested: 4
Charm: 2011
Length: 34" in length


* Items are shipped out within 2-3 business days after receiving a cleared payment.
* Shipped USPS Priority Mail - Flat Rate Box $10.50
* All sales are final, so I please ask you to email me with any questions prior to buying.
* NO International / Canada Shipping
* NO returns accepted. My home is smoke and pet free.
* Thank you for checking out my listing! Have FUN Buying!
